T02TD1697E:53a-3: me tog phreng 'dzin gyi sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02TD1697E:53a-4: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1697E:53a-5: lha dang lha min nor lha'i cod pan ston ka'i nyi 'od 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis zhabs kyi rdul la reg / rnyog med gzigs pa'i shes rab mig ni snying rje'i rlan gyis rab tu gang zhing nyon mongs dra ba gcod //
T02TD1697E:53a-6: rmongs pa'i mthu yis srid pa'i mtsho chen mi zad skye 'chi'i dba' rgal drag pos kun nas g-yengs gyur pa //
T02TD1697E:53a-7: skyob pa'i gzings chen dri med gzugs mdzes dpal gyi snying po me tog phreng 'dzin de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1697E:53a-8: gang zhig spros bral mkha' ltar dag pa'i dbyings su ro gcig pa //
T02TD1697E:53a-9: bsam gtan sprin med aa sogs yi ges snying gar rab brgyan cing //
T02TD1697E:53a-10: gus pa'i sbyor bas sna tshogs mthu ldan yon tan rin chen gter //
T02TD1697E:53a-11: drang srong tshe 'dzin bla ma'i gsung las bdag gis 'dir brjod bya //
T02TD1697E:53a-12: rab tu zhi la dga' ba'i bden 'dzin nags tshal lam //
T02TD1697E:53a-13: g-yeng ba'i rdul bral phug gam ljon shing dur khrod mchog / chu 'gram dben pa'i sa phyogs rang bzhin nyams dga' bar //
T02TD1697E:53a-14: chu gtsang spos kyi chag chag me tog dri zhim gtor //
T02TD1697E:53a-15: rgyal ba'i sku gzugs dam chos rin chen bzhugs pa dang //
T02TD1697E:53a-16: me tog bdug spos snang ba dri dang zhal zas mchog / rgyal sras yum dang dkyil 'khor mchod phyir legs bzhag bya //
T02TD1697E:53a-17: ri dags 'gan 'ji sngon po legs par btags gyur pa'i //
T02TD1697E:53a-18: stan la 'dug nas bsam gtan bdag gis bsgom par bya //
T02TD1697E:53a-19: thog mar 'od gsal rten 'brel bde stong mi g-yo ba //
T02TD1697E:53a-20: gang zhig shar bas spyod pa'i dus na yul rnams dang //
T02TD1697E:53a-21: dbang po'i tshogs dag rtog bral tshul gyis kun du nub //
T02TD1697E:53b-0: rtog @53b med rtog bral rdo rje'i mchog 'dzin kun du khyab //
T02TD1697E:53b-1: ji bzhin rtog pa'i mtha' las rang sems sa bon mchog / zla 'od dkar mdzes t'am las phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar //
T02TD1697E:53b-2: shin tu rno ba'i 'od zer chen pos khams gsum gyi //
T02TD1697E:53b-3: mun pa'i tshogs bcom rgyal ba sras rnams nam mkha' la //
T02TD1697E:53b-4: bzhugs par bltas la bdag yid rtse gcig dri med kyi //
T02TD1697E:53b-5: gang zhig sna tshogs ro gcig dbang po'i gzhu 'dra ba //
T02TD1697E:53b-6: nyon mongs rdul bral zhi bde spros bral bde 'gro zhing //
T02TD1697E:53b-7: ye shes rgyun 'bab rgyal ba'i sku mdzes padmo la //
T02TD1697E:53b-8: gus pa'i tshul gyis mgrin pa smad nas bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1697E:53b-9: kha dog sna tshogs dri zhi ma dbyibs mdzes me tog dang //
T02TD1697E:53b-10: bdug spos aa ga ru dang sbrul gyi snying po dang //
T02TD1697E:53b-11: snod mdzes rin chen sgron ma snang ba drir bcas dang //
T02TD1697E:53b-12: chu gtsang dri zhim snying po sbyor ba dpag med dang //
T02TD1697E:53b-13: mdog bzang ro brgya ldan pa'i zhal zas mang po rnams //
T02TD1697E:53b-14: gus bcas yid 'ong rgyal sras khyed la 'bul lags kyis //
T02TD1697E:53b-15: sems can tshogs rnams srid pa'i gdung bzhi bar mdzod //
T02TD1697E:53b-18: aom badzra a'a lo ke a'a:h'um /
T02TD1697E:53b-20: aom badzra nee wi tya a'a: h'um /
T02TD1697E:53b-21: gnod pa byed rnams dge ba'i phyogs las nyams pa dang //
T02TD1697E:53b-22: sdig pa'i gzhir gyur bsten du mi rung ji snyed las //
T02TD1697E:53b-23: dug gi sgregs pas sems gdung gyur pa bdag sogs kyi //
T02TD1697E:53b-24: phra rgyas tshon chen zag pa'i tshang tshing zad par mdzod //
T02TD1697E:53b-25: gang zhig rgyal sras thub pa'i 'od tshogs mdzes pa'i tshal //
T02TD1697E:53b-26: 'bras bu smin pa'i ljid kyi zug rdu gnon mdzad cing //
T02TD1697E:53b-27: snying rje'i rgyun gyis nyon mongs tha ba brlan mdzad pa //
T02TD1697E:53b-28: dregs pa'i rdul bral skyong ba'i mgon la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1697E:53b-29: yang dag lam bral lta ba'i dug gis myos gyur cing //
T02TD1697E:53b-30: nyon mongs mtsho chen brgal dka'i ngogs su lhung ba rnams //
T02TD1697E:53b-31: shes rab gzings chen snying rje'i go cha mi 'gyur mchog / dri med yid 'ong zla ba'i mdangs gsal thob par gyis //
T02TD1697E:53b-32: rab tu zab pa'i dka' thub dpal gyis 'bar ba dang //
T02TD1697E:53b-33: nyon mongs chags bral byams pa snying rje dga' ba dang //
T02TD1697E:54a-0: btang snyoms yid brtan rim gro byed @54a * //
T02TD1697E:54a-1: ba'i bde ba'i mchog / khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' ltar ro gcig bde //
T02TD1697E:54a-2: bde gshegs byed pa sgyu ma'i yon tan dpag med rnams //
T02TD1697E:54a-3: srid gsum 'gro ba dbang po'i dri ma sbyong byed pa //
T02TD1697E:54a-4: rab dga' sems kyi gru chen nam mkha'i dbyings su 'gyur //
T02TD1697E:54a-5: nyi zla'i sbyor bas mun ba zad 'gyur grong mchog lam //
T02TD1697E:54a-6: bdud rtsi sgron mi chu gter yid bzhin rin po che //
T02TD1697E:54a-7: rdul med rdul bral ye shes dbang phyug phyag rgya can //
T02TD1697E:54a-8: ye shes mthar son sna tshogs lus can kun ston pa //
T02TD1697E:54a-9: ting 'dzin dag pa'i lus can 'phags ma thob par shog /
T02TD1697E:54a-10: de nas byams pa snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms bsgom //
T02TD1697E:54a-11: gdod nas sems ni ma skyes rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba //
T02TD1697E:54a-12: nges don bdud rtsi nam mkha' las byung dag pa bsten //
T02TD1697E:54a-13: rtog pa rgyun chad sems nyid de nyid gzhan ma yin //
T02TD1697E:54a-14: chu tshod thun dang dbyu gu skad cig rim pa med //
T02TD1697E:54a-15: mi 'jigs sgro skur mi rtsol rgyal sras thu bo ste //
T02TD1697E:54a-16: gdod nas ma skyes chos rnams byed pa thig le yin //
T02TD1697E:54a-17: spros bral chos nyid yang dag nyid ni snang ba sa dben //
T02TD1697E:54a-18: bskyed rdzogs theg pa'i mtha' bral rtog med bde chen po //
T02TD1697E:54a-19: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma konyaham /
T02TD1697E:54a-20: de nas snying rje'i shugs kyis rab tu bskul gyur nas //
T02TD1697E:54a-21: rang snying pam las sna tshogs padma de steng a'a: //
T02TD1697E:54a-22: lte ba zla bas brgyan cing dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi //
T02TD1697E:54a-23: kun nas bskor ba'i t'am las phyogs bcur 'od tshogs 'phros //
T02TD1697E:54a-24: 'gro ba'i don byas tshur la bsdus nas t'am la thim //
T02TD1697E:54a-25: de rnams skad cig nyid la sgrol ma'i sku lngar gyur //
T02TD1697E:54a-26: sngon mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi stag gi gos gyon ma //
T02TD1697E:54a-27: gri gug thod pa ral gri sdigs mdzub phyag rgya can //
T02TD1697E:54a-28: ser mo zhal gsum phyag drug g-yas sngo g-yon pa dmar //
T02TD1697E:54a-29: ral gri dgra sta mda' dang zhags pa gzhu dang dung //
T02TD1697E:54a-30: zhal gcig phyag bzhi btsod kyi kha dog sna tshogs brgyan //
T02TD1697E:54a-31: mi 'jigs mda' dang gzhu dang autpala dmar po bsnams //
T02TD1697E:54a-32: sku mdog ldang ser chos kyi phyag rgyas thugs ka ru //
T02TD1697E:54a-33: autpala sngo 'dzin shar sogs go rims ji bzhin du //
T02TD1697E:54a-34: sna tshogs rgyan ldan phyogs rnams sreg cing gsang sngags bzlas //
T02TD1697E:54b-0: rnam snang la @54b sogs rgyal po'i rigs kyis dbu brgyan pa //
T02TD1697E:54b-1: nu ma rgyas shing mi 'jigs phyag dang autpala 'dzin //
T02TD1697E:54b-2: brtson pa'i lus ldan zla ba'i mdangs can dbus su bsam //
T02TD1697E:54b-3: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re ni shthi d'a ra na pra ti ha ta tstt'a ausham ha na sv'a h'a /
T02TD1697E:54b-4: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re bha ya ha ra na raksha ba ra ne gu ba tim biddhya sa ma he sv'a h'a /
T02TD1697E:54b-5: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa na bhi pradzny'a pra sannat aa bhi pradzny'a pra s'a dha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1697E:54b-6: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re bha ya ha ra na h'um h'um h'um mrityu danda ya ma dyu ta sv'a h'a /
T02TD1697E:54b-7: de ltar gsang sngags bzlas pa'i 'od kyis phyogs khyab cing //
T02TD1697E:54b-8: gzungs kyi snying po mthu chen 'di yang brjod par bya //
T02TD1697E:54b-9: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02TD1697E:54b-10: na ma: a'ary'a wa lo ki te shva ra ya /
T02TD1697E:54b-13: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02TD1697E:54b-15: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba du sht'a na pra du sht'a na ma ma kri te dzam bha ya stam bha ya /
T02TD1697E:54b-18: h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat /
T02TD1697E:54b-19: sarba du sht'a stam bha na t'a re sv'a h'a /
T02TD1697E:54b-20: mang du bzlas la stobs bskyed cho ga 'di ltar bsam //
T02TD1697E:54b-21: snod mdzes nang du 'bras sogs kha zas bzang po rnams //
T02TD1697E:54b-22: mngon par bshams pa'i cha gnyis padma kha bye ba'i //
T02TD1697E:54b-23: phyag rgya bcing zhing sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog / lan bdun brjod pas kha dog dri ro phun sum tshogs //
T02TD1697E:54b-24: aom na ma: sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am ;
T02TD1697E:54b-25: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am /
T02TD1697E:54b-26: he he bha ga ba ti me sa d'a sarba buddha a'a ba lo ki te /
T02TD1697E:54b-27: ai dam pa lim gri hna grihna /
T02TD1697E:54b-28: aa mri ta kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02TD1697E:54b-29: tishthi tishtha h'um h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1697E:54b-30: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'a a'adya nutpanna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1697E:54b-31: aom aa mri ta kha kha kh'a ti kh'a hi tishthi tishtha /
T02TD1697E:54b-36: pi spho ta ya bi spho ta ya /
T02TD1697E:54b-37: sarba bi ghn'am bi n'a ya /
T02TD1697E:54b-38: ma h'a ga na pa ti dz'i wi t'anta ka r'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1697E:54b-39: dpag med cha gcig rig pa'i lha mo rnams la 'bul //
T02TD1697E:54b-40: cha gcig nang du 'od zer sbu gu bskyed byas te //
T02TD1697E:54b-41: nag po chen po tha skar dbyig gi snying po dang //
T02TD1697E:54b-42: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin grul bum tshogs rnams la //
T02TD1697E:54b-43: 'dod pa'i gsol ba btab cing gus pas dbul bar bya //
T02TD1697E:54b-44: brgyad dang bcu bzhi bcu dang nyi shu gsum rnams la //
T02TD1697E:54b-45: zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang mngon spyod sbyin sreg dbul //
T02TD1697E:55a-1: dang nag po'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T02TD1697E:55a-2: rtse khru gcig dang gcig dang phyed dang rtse khru gcig / zlum dang gru bzhi zla gam gru gsum bri bar bya //
T02TD1697E:55a-3: thams cad sor bzhi bskyed cing 'od phreng phyi rol bri //
T02TD1697E:55a-4: 'khor lo dkar dang sna tshogs rdo rje ser po dang //
T02TD1697E:55a-5: padma dmar dang gri gug sngon po thabs rnams kyi //
T02TD1697E:55a-6: rim pa ji bzhin legs par nang du dgod par bya //
T02TD1697E:55a-7: mar dang zho dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi ka ra dang //
T02TD1697E:55a-8: 'bras til gro dang nas sogs 'bru yi rnam pa dang //
T02TD1697E:55a-9: d'ur ba ku sha la sogs cho ga gzhan bzhin bsogs //
T02TD1697E:55a-10: de las gzhan pa'i sreg rdzas khyad par mang po rnams //
T02TD1697E:55a-11: nye bar bshams la thog mar drang srong me lha mchog / zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog dkar po tshangs skud can //
T02TD1697E:55a-12: dbyug pa spyi blugs bgrang phreng mi 'jigs phyag rgya can //
T02TD1697E:55a-13: ral pa'i cod pan dka' thub lus ring zla ba'i steng //
T02TD1697E:55a-14: mngon par bskyed la dgang blugs bdun gyis rab tu mchod //
T02TD1697E:55a-15: dza: zhes brjod cing se gol gtogs la gshegs par bsam //
T02TD1697E:55a-16: aom bahni r'a dzny'a pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1697E:55a-17: de nas rdzas dang me thab dri chab bzang pos bsang //
T02TD1697E:55a-18: aom bro ksh'a li bi shuddhe sv'a h'a /
T02TD1697E:55a-19: mchod pa'i yo byad snying po'i sngags kyis dbul bar bya //
T02TD1697E:55a-20: mnyes par gyur nas smon lam btab cing mi snang bsgom //
T02TD1697E:55a-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig sems can skyong //
T02TD1697E:55a-22: ched du brjod la lus ngag yid gsum gyi /
T02TD1697E:55a-23: spyod lam khyad par can gyis gnas bya zhing //
T02TD1697E:55a-24: de las gzhan pa'i bsod nams mang po bsags //
T02TD1697E:55a-25: drang srong tshe 'dzin bla ma'i gsung snyan bdag la bsnyad gyur pa //
T02TD1697E:55a-26: byang chub myu gu'i phreng bas lus brgyan gzhan don 'brug sgra sgrogs //
T02TD1697E:55a-27: snying rje'i shugs kyis bsod nams sprin chen grags pa'i char rgyun gyis //
T02TD1697E:55a-28: nyon mongs 'khrugs pa'i me chen rab tu bsil bar byed par shog / me tog phreng 'dzin sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs 'phags pa 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlab pa panti ta chen po ta tha' ga t'a ra kshi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1697E:55a-30: // / cog gru lo ts'a ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o//
